title.en: Color Fantasy Ferrybox data from Oslo-Kiel

description.en: Extraction of daily Ferrybox environmental monitoring data from the Color Fantasy. Once every minute, the FerryBox system measures at a depth of four to seven metres along the fixed route of a vessel. This amounts to about one measurement every 500 metres. Output is a .csv file with a latitudal transect between Oslo (Norway) and Kiel (Germany) for temperature, salinity, oxygen_sat, chlorophyll, turbidity and fdom.
